      • getUnitWithoutType

        public bwapi.Unit getUnitWithoutType​(bwapi.Game game,
                                     bwapi.Player self,
                                     bwapi.UnitType target,
                                     bwapi.UnitType type,
                                     int radius)
        Returns a unit of type target that has no units of type type in the specified radius
        Parameters:
        game - Game value assigned at game start
        self - Player assigned to the bot
        target - UnitType to use as the anchor for the radius
        type - UnitType to check radius for
        radius - Size of radius from the target unit
        Returns:
        A unit of type target with no units of type type in the radius
